main.name: Rahul Aryan
main.occupation: Frontend Developer at SearchBlox and Freelance Full-Stack(MERN) Developer
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hi, my name is Rahul Aryan. I am a Full Stack Web and Mobile Application Developer and a JavaScript and Artificial Intelligence enthusiast.My primary focus is on building Front End Web Applications, Native Mobile Applications, Integrations, Alexa Skills, and Google Actions.My skillsets include languages like JavaScript,Python,SQL together with frameworks like Django,React JS,React Native,Node JS, and Bootstrap.I do this because I love the process of turning dreams into reality by converting ideas into code. I have a serious passion for designing the top-grade UIâ€™s with working logic to create a dynamic user experience.I have spent the past two years learning top-notch technologies and enhancing my skill sets.On a side note, I love listening music and learning new technologies every day. It is something that allows me to be creative, connect with people, and even just bring people together through debugging.

work.title: Full-Stack Developer
work.description: We can build any type of Website and Apps

testimonials.text: Rahul is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Work with Rahul has been AWESOME, he makes so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
